articles.author: Pia Singh, Yun Li
articles.title: S&P 500 closes lower as Nvidia pulls down tech sector, Dow briefly touches record: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Shares of several big-name chipmakers declined during the session, putting pressure on the Nasdaq and broader market.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 pulled back on Tuesday, weighed down by Nvidia shares and a broad decline in technology stocks.
The broad market S&P 500 lost 0.59% and closed at 6,411.37, while the Nasdaq Compo… [+2514 chars]
